alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf, southwestern Wakulla, southern Liberty and northern Franklin Counties through 1030 PM EDT/930 PM CDT/... At 959 PM EDT/859 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 18 miles north of Eastpoint, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Mcintyre, Chipola Cutoff, Sanborn, Owens Bridge, Sumatra, Willis Landing, Lanark Village, Dalkeith and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
